q1: What are Spain's best football teams?
q2: In which year did Spain win their first European Championship?
q3: What country borders Spain to the west?
a3: Portugal border Spain to the west. I am glad you ask about geography.
q4: Does David Villa still play for Spain?
a4: He officially retired from international football, but he played in the World Cup qualifiers recently.
a5: They need some turnover on the squad and to give chances to some younger players.
